body:
I will try to get one up, about to travel in 2 days to GoGaRuCo so it is
getting quite hectic, if anyone can help with the test it would be awesome.

I can easily simulate a failure by mucking with internals but wonder how
normal framework usage can cause it, are there model initializers that
bypass initialize and init_with?


On Mon, Sep 16, 2013 at 11:17 PM, Santiago Pastorino <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @SamSaffron <https://github.com/SamSaffron> can we have a test for this?
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub<https://github.com/rails/rails/pull/12243#issuecomment-24508657>
> .
>
